intro: Psychotria suerrensis, commonly known as the yellow psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking yellow flowers, which contrast with its dark green foliage. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria suerrensis is often found in association with other epiphytic plants, thriving in the canopy layers of tropical forests.
